name: SoundsofWaves
0:
”Alexa open sounds of waves”
”Alexa ask sounds of waves to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sounds of waves
des: Fall into a deep sleep with our dreamy and waves sounds. Sounds of Waves is the ultimate science-backed companion for relaxation, focus, and better sleep. \n\nAll you need to do is say Alexa start Sounds of Waves, and she will play the track for 30 minutes. This is a perfect skill to leave on while you are asleep, to use for relaxation and meditation, or to tune in and focus on your work.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
